title: Twitch: Kai Cenat banned from streaming platform
description: The streamer holds the record for most subscriptions, with more than 300,000 at its peak.

title: Hikvision: Chinese surveillance tech giant denies leaked Pentagon spy claim
description: A leaked US government document alleged that Hikvision was likely enabling Chinese espionage.

title: Apple in Mumbai: Tim Cook set to inaugurate first store in India
description: The Apple CEO tweeted that he "can't wait to welcome" customers to the new store in Mumbai city.
